name: Date And Institution Name
description:
Specifies the date and institution information where a staff member became active or inactive.

Note: Replaces the CM data type used in sections 15.4.6.12 STF-12 and 15.4.6.14 STF-13, as of v 2.5.

fields.name: Date
fields.description: Specifies the date when a staff member became active or inactive.

fields.name: Institution Name
fields.description: Specifies the institution where a staff member is or was active. Refer to User-Defined Table 0531 - Institution for suggested values.
